metadata.name: Chill Out
metadata.description:
• Passive • Grants immunity to all non-self-inflicted damage for two seconds upon entering a room • Can give Paper Isaac transformation • Repentance and multiplayer support
When you enter a room, you become immune to most damage sources for two seconds. You are [i]not[/i] immune to self-inflicted damage (IV Bag, Kamikaze, etc), special non-enemy entities (blood donation machine, devil beggar, etc), or spiked doors. Basically, you can't abuse it.
[u]Item Pools[/u] • Treasure Room
[u]Transformation[/u] • Paper Isaac
This item is also included in the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1826418847]Paper Isaac modpack[/url].
